formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: State tax: T_{PA} = 0.0307 \times I_{t} Local Earned Income Tax: T_{local} = \frac{r_{local}}{100} \times I_{t} Net income (after state + local): Net = I_{t} - T_{PA} - T_{local} Per‑paycheck mode (annualization with P periods): I_{annual} = I_{check} \times P T_{PA,check} = 0.0307 \times I_{check} T_{local,check} = \frac{r_{local}}{100} \times I_{check}

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
